name: Coin Fall (GBA Jam 2022)
description:
I made a Fall Guys inspired 3D platformer obstacle course for the GBA.

This game is my entry for the GBA Jam 2022: https://itch.io/jam/gbajam22 

I made everything you see from scratch. Check out YouTube-3DSage for my 3D programming tutorials! https://www.youtube.com/c/3dsage

You play as an arcade coin that needs to get to the end of the course in under 60 seconds. 

Bronze metal 30-40 seconds

Silver metal 20-30 seconds

Gold metal under 20 seconds

Collect all 4 gold metals to unlock 2X speed and jumping.

To cross a further distance, you can double jump if you walk off a surface. 

Your best time will be displayed over each level so you can continue to optimize your Speedrunning.
